name: BLEWP! Eat or be Eaten .IO Ⓞ Free-for-all MMO AGAroI Games Online!
name_original: BLEWP! Eat or be Eaten .IO Ⓞ Free-for-all MMO AGAroI Games Online!
description:
Play ONLINE with Thousands of other players, in this FAST-PACED real-time multiplayer game!
#####################
Eat other BLOBs, don't let your BLOB get eaten! It's so simple, but endlessly entertaining!

You can quickly play a round on the go, or enjoy it for hours on end, this is a game you'll be sure to enjoy.

Name your Blob, use cool skins, and CHAT with other players. Make teams with other players, and sometimes betray them (MUAHAHAH). REALLY fun! Seriously, don't even trust us, try it!

This is the BEST cells game, with these amazing features:
-Game chat, with chat bubbles!
-Divide multiple cells
-Unlimited eject mass
-Viruses eat mass, and divide!
-200+ cell skins, over 25 UNIQUE ONES
-Beautiful live-rendered cell graphics
-Smooth controls and movement


YOU WON'T WANT TO PUT IT DOWN- It's really addictive!

With beautiful graphics, fun sounds, and great controls, we highly recommend that you give this game a try!
